items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes and updates instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any team member, all other members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual refresh.
non_functional: System should handle up to 500 concurrent users without performance degradation
Updates must be delivered with latency under 2 seconds

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks collaboratively.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, assignee, and due date.
Multiple users can view and edit the same board simultaneously without data loss.
non_functional: UI should load within 3 seconds on standard broadband
Support for at least 100 active tasks per board without lag

notes: Assumed that the app will support both web and mobile platforms; specific platforms and integrations not provided in the requirement.
